communications.communication:
To the FOIA Officer of Niles Police Department Illinois,

This request is made under the provisions of Illinois Freedom of Information Act. for the following records:

All documents pertaining to ReKor (https://www.rekor.ai/) license-plate-reader hardware and/or software. Documents being requested here should include - but are not limited to - the following:

- Invoices, receipts, and/or requests for the purchase of any ReKor product/service
- MOUs from ReKor
- Brochures or product/service specifications regarding ReKor
- Privacy and/or retention policies regarding ReKor product/services
- Any/all manuals regarding ReKor product/services
- Guidelines mentioning ReKor product/services
- Bulletins mentioning ReKor product/services
- Briefings mentioning ReKor product/services
- Any/all digitally disseminated publications from your agency mentioning ReKor product/services

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the case of any applicable fees, it is requested that an estimate of the total charges be provided prior to fulfilling this request. The preferred method of receipt is through electronic delivery.

Your assistance and cooperation in this matter are greatly appreciated. A response within 5 business days, as the statute requires days of this request is anticipated.

With thanks,

David S. (he/him/his), Lucy Parsons Labs
